top.title: 'Maybe she's an angel now' says aunt of 10-year-old Bondi victim
top.summary: Lina Chernykh tells the BBC her niece Matilda was a joyous child who spread love everywhere she went.

top.title: Australian PM announces crackdown on hate speech after Bondi shooting
top.summary: Measures include fresh penalties for 'those who spread hate' as well as new powers to cancel or refuse visas.

top.title: Rob Reiner's family breaks silence as son Nick faces judge on murder charges
top.summary: Jake and Romy Reiner say they are in "unimaginable pain", as their brother faces first-degree murder charges over their parents' death.

top.title: Fifa video game to return after four years in Netflix exclusive
top.summary: The game will be made by Delphi Interactive and released in time for the 2026  World Cup.

top.title: Downing Street insists negotiations over US-UK tech deal still live
top.summary: When the partnership was unveiled in September the UK government said it would "shape the futures of millions of people".

top.title: Former chancellor George Osborne joins OpenAI
top.summary: Osborne said it was a privilege to become managing director of OpenAI for Countries based in London.

title.#text: The ChatGPT app store is here

LG and Dolby partner to release the first FlexConnect soundbar
